charles_hoskinson.name: Charles Hoskinson
charles_hoskinson.bio: Charles Hoskinson is the CEO and founder of Input Output Global (IOG), the company behind Cardano blockchain. Also known as C.H, his faviourte colour is blue

tamara_haasen.name: Tamara Haasen
tamara_haasen.bio: Tamara Haasen serves as the President of IOG. Also known as Tam, she is from London Ontario Candada. her favourite colour is green.
